```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
theme_set(theme_light())
options(scipen = 999)

taiwan_china <- read_csv("taiwan-china-trade.csv") 
china_taiwan <- read_csv("china-trade-taiwan.csv") %>% mutate(pct_export = total_export_taiwan / total_export) %>% filter(year > 1998)
```

```{r}
g <- taiwan_china %>% 
  select(year, total_export, total_export_china) %>% 
  filter(year > 1998) %>% 
  mutate(pct_export = total_export_china / total_export) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, pct_export)) +
  geom_line(size = 1)
  
g + geom_line(data = china_taiwan, aes(year, pct_export), linetype = "dashed", size = 1) + scale_y_continuous(labels = percent_format()) + labs(title = "Figure. Uneven Reliance", subtitle = "Trade data shows Taiwan needs China more", x = "", y = "", caption = "Source: Ministry of Finance, ROC; China Statistics Yearbook")

```
